name: Power Tools VR
description: Power Tools is an immersive, room-scale VR experience that gives you a blast of adrenaline as you chop, lop, slice and dice. The aim is to shape a block with a range of power tools, such as chainsaws, axes and drills. How you tackle the task is up to you! Go for a full on stress-busting blast of aggression or take a more considered approach by fine-tuning your sculpting skills to create a face, a tree, a car, its up to you…or you could just drill!
